General.Name: Penguen Gida Sanayi AS
General.Description: Penguen Gida Sanayi A.S. produces and sells fruit and vegetable products in Turkey. The company's products include jam, preserved vegetables, ready meals, preserved boiled legumes, tomato and pepper pastes, pickles, sauces and spreads, preserves, roasted products, and frozen food products, as well as frozen fruits and vegetables. It offers its products to national and local market chains, and middle-sized retailers, as well as mass consumption channels, such as hotels, restaurants, and cafeterias. The company exports its products to 35 countries, including Germany, the United States, France, the Netherlands, Switzerland, Russia, and Sweden. Penguen Gida Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey.
